title_sort: louisa van velsor whitman to walt whitman, [13 or 14 may 1873]
title: Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, [13 or 14 May 1873]
text: My dear beloved sondontdon't be worried about me i hope i shall be all right again my nerviousnervous system is very much out of order i know i have brought in on by worrying but i cantcan't seem to get over it my head feels bad sometimes my rheumatics is better if i could be with you dear waltWalt i would be glad it wasentwasn't right for me to come here to liveas things has not been as i could wish but i hope i shall get a better appetite some time as i have such trembling spelsspells its all my nerves i know dontdon't worry walterWalter dear i hope your mother will get better if i could get away from here i would be glad georgeGeorge is good to me but he aintain't home much of his timeyou must come on the 1 of the month1873 Winter End Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, [13 or 14 May 1873]
